sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Form, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'
import StarRating from './StarRating'


const ReviewForm = () => {

    const starClick = (e) => {
        console.log(e.target)
    }

    return (

        <Form>
            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                <Form.Label>Title</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="Title" />
            </Form.Group>
            
            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                <Form.Label>Description</Form.Label>  
                <Form.Control as="textarea" placeholder="Tell us about your experience!" />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                <Form.Label>Ambience</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="How was the environment?" />
            </Form.Group>
            <Row>
                <Col>
                    <Form.Group>
                        <Form.Label>Beverage Rating: </Form.Label>
                        <StarRating onClick={(e) => {starClick(e)}} />
                    </Form.Group>
                </Col>
                <Col>
                    <Form.Group>
                        <Form.Label>Service Rating: </Form.Label>
                        <StarRating onClick={(e) => {starClick(e)}} />
                    </Form.Group>
                </Col>
            </Row>
            <Form.Group>
                <Form.Label>Overall Rating: </Form.Label>
                <StarRating onClick={(e) => {starClick(e)}} />
            </Form.Group>
            <Button  align="right" variant="dark" type="submit">
                Submit
            </Button>
        </Form>
    )

}

export default ReviewForm
